content.question: Which of the following best accounts for the difference between Volpedo's and Jansen's perspectives on industrial workersâ€™ role in society reflected in the two paintings?

choices.label: The widespread disillusionment and erosion of the notion of progress as a result of the First World War
The boost to socialist movements in western Europe as a result of the success of the Bolshevik Revolution in Russia
The detrimental economic and social effects of the Great Depression
The arrival of large numbers of guest workers from eastern Europe and former colonies

content.answer: The widespread disillusionment and erosion of the notion of progress as a result of the First World War

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
